item.title: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description: What is the correct way to use fliteController with RapidEars for feedback on hypothesis? If I try to have the fliteController give feedback in rapidEarsDidReceiveFinishedSpeechHypothesis: but it gets picked up by RapidEars. I need a reliable way to suspend and resume while flite is speaking. I have tried to suspend/resume pocketsphynx to no avail.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Hello,

FliteController handles its own suspend and resume, you don’t need to do it.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description: I read that as well but it is not working. RapidEars picks up flite in rapidEarsDidReceiveFinishedSpeechHypothesis: after it is said.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
OK, can you check out this topic about logging and show the complete logging (OpenEarsLogging, verbosePocketsphinx, setRapidEarsToVerbose:TRUE) from a session in which that happens:

Please read before you post â€“ how to troubleshoot and provide logging info here

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description:
Halle,

Thanks for the quick responses. Here is the log data:

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description: To clarify, all I am doing is checking for hypothesis data in rapidEarsDidReceiveFinishedSpeechHypothesis: and running flite like so [self.fliteController say:@”SET THE DURATION” withVoice:self.slt];. I do run a changeLanguageModelToFile right before this if that makes any difference. RapidEars picks up audio from flite and since I am listening for a command that begins with “SET” in my rule it thinks it hears set and returns a result.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: Do you get a different outcome when you don’t change models right before?

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description: No, I commented it out and still had the same results.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: Is it hearing the entire phrase or a subset?

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Flite and RapidEars
item.dc:creator: adb
item.description: Sorry for the delayed response. It appears to be hearing all of it. I will change my rule to match exactly what flite is saying and test that quick.
